features: Portable The cushion is 14.6 x 10.7 inches, 1.5 Lbs. It folds in half with built in carry handles for easy transportation between your home, office, car, airplane, show, etc. But this cushion, although it does not cover the entire area, can provide a comfortable riding experience for your buttocks on seats without too much padding.Simply wipe down to wash.

Resilient The cushion is 14.6 x 10.7 inches The gel maintains its original shape and won't lose its support, even after long term use. A non- slip friction bead grip bottom surface ensures that it stays in place.

Soft & Breathable:This gel cushion for Foldable is composed of hundreds of air columns, which are very soft and well breathable. The gel cushion for sitting can reduce hip sweating, without being stuffy and hot, make your seat more comfortable.

Detachable Cover and Portable: The portable seat cushion is designed with handle,detachable cover, washing machine safe, also foldable, space saving, you can take it with you to stadium, office, other room, airplane, bus, metro，train, car and so on. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multi occasion use Its size is perfect for placing two knees next to the bathtub! That's true! I put down the non slip side so that I can kneel comfortably when bathing the child. Yes, it can be folded up and has a handle, so if we go on a trip, I can also bring it with me. This is perfect for me, especially for mothers/grandmothers who have to kneel by the bathtub to give their children a bath, but their knees are painful and unbearable. It's much better than on a tile floor! The gel is very thick and can fully meet the needs of the knees. If I want to take it to church to kneel, it can even be used (with a handle!)! There are also kneeling pads in the church, but they are not as comfortable as this gel.it is still worth it because it relieves the pain and injury in my arthritis affected knee.
Gel Seat Cushion Portable Massage Travel Cushions，

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to carry
reviews.reviewText: This is super portable and doesn't take up much space when transporting. I like that it folds in half as it means I also have the option to fold it and use it as a thicker padding for my lower back as well as unfolded as a seat cushion.
